body_html:
I pulled master today and I still have the same issue building pip package. I am on Ubuntu 14.04.
I have not interrupted bazel.
Note, a similar issue referred to a stale config file build_config.bzl, but that file is modified by ./configure, so it always appears to have been locally modified:

diff --git a/tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl b/tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl
index 633441f..7e6549b 100644
--- a/tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl
+++ b/tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl
@@ -4,9 +4,9 @@ load("//google/protobuf:protobuf.bzl", "cc_proto_library")
load("//google/protobuf:protobuf.bzl", "py_proto_library")

configure may change the following lines to '.X.Y' or similar

-CUDA_VERSION = ""
+CUDA_VERSION = ".7.5"

-CUDNN_VERSION = ""
+CUDNN_VERSION = ".4"

Appends a suffix to a list of deps.

def tf_deps(deps, suffix):

Build error:
ERROR: /home/karenbre/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/BUILD:158:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc:grpc_remote_master':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_remote_master.cc':
'bazel-out/local_linux-opt/genfiles/tensorflow/core/protobuf/master_service.grpc.pb.h'.
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.
INFO: Elapsed time: 344.224s, Critical Path: 149.03s

body:
I pulled master today and I still have the same issue building pip package. I am on Ubuntu 14.04. 
I have not interrupted bazel. 
Note, a similar issue referred to a stale config file build_config.bzl, but that file is modified by ./configure, so it always appears to have been locally modified:

diff --git a/tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl b/tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl
index 633441f..7e6549b 100644
--- a/tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl
+++ b/tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl
@@ -4,9 +4,9 @@ load("//google/protobuf:protobuf.bzl", "cc_proto_library")
 load("//google/protobuf:protobuf.bzl", "py_proto_library")

 # configure may change the following lines to '.X.Y' or similar
-CUDA_VERSION = ""
+CUDA_VERSION = ".7.5"

-CUDNN_VERSION = ""
+CUDNN_VERSION = ".4"

 # Appends a suffix to a list of deps.
 def tf_deps(deps, suffix):

---

Build error:
ERROR: /home/karenbre/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/BUILD:158:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc:grpc_remote_master':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_remote_master.cc':
  'bazel-out/local_linux-opt/genfiles/tensorflow/core/protobuf/master_service.grpc.pb.h'.
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.
INFO: Elapsed time: 344.224s, Critical Path: 149.03s
